code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="http://192.168.22.56:8080/api/auth/";class AuthService{login(username,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signin",{username,password}).then(response=>{if(response.data.accessToken){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});}logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");}register(username,email,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signup",{username,email,password});}}export default new AuthService();
